webProjects.title: MMCM OCP Internship Website
webProjects.body: A website created for Mapúa Malayan Colleges Mindanao to handle the internship operations of the school. All partner companies are listed here, and students can apply for internships and submit requirements.

webProjects.title: MMCM CCIS Website
webProjects.body: A website created for the College of Computer and Information Science Department of Mapúa Malayan Colleges Mindanao.

webProjects.title: MCM Virtual Marketplace 2020
webProjects.body: A website created for Mapúa Malayan Colleges Mindanao's Office for Student Services during the December Virtual Marketing event.

webProjects.title: MCM Virtual Club Fair
webProjects.body: A frontend and backend project for the MCM Virtual Club Fair 2020. The website is used to showcase the institution's student clubs and organization.

webProjects.title: MCM Fusion Technicity: Voting Website
webProjects.body: This Webite is used to assist the MCM Fusion: Technicity event for the academic year 2020-2021 on October 2, 2020. The Website will handle the votation process for the Mr and Ms Staycation, Show Stopper, MCMFlicks and Chill, and Vattle of the Vands. The website also showcases a live display of current votes.

academicProjects.title: Reinforcement Learning For Simulating Personal Navigation UAV
academicProjects.body: An academic research project for our Machine Learning course. The project aims to develop a model that is capable of navigating and following its owner. The model is trained in an Unity virtual environment.

academicProjects.title: ChatTalkCGC: A Responsive Platform For Guidance and Counselling of Academic and Non-Academic Matters in MCM
academicProjects.body: An academic research project for IT129, IT104P, and CS140-2P that aims to provide a platform for students and the MCM's Office of Student Services to communicate. SCOPUS publication.
academicProjects.awards: Best Presenter in Track 1: Automation Engineering and Information Technology
